sentences.cn: “请大家买票！”售票员大声叫着。

sentences.en: A good bawl made her feel better.
sentences.cn: 痛痛快快哭一场使她好过些了.

sentences.en: A good bawl usually makes her feel better.
sentences.cn: 一场号哭通常会使她好过些.

sentences.en: Do you think I'm just going to bawl you out and that'll be an end of it?
sentences.cn: 你觉得我把你痛骂一顿就完事了？

sentences.en: Don't bawl out like that. I can hear you.
sentences.cn: 别这样穷呼喝, 我听得见.

sentences.en: He got a bad grade. His father will bawl out.
sentences.cn: 他打了低分, 他爸爸会大骂的.

sentences.en: If she thought of these things, she'd begin to scream and bawl like Prissy.
sentences.cn: 要是她还一心去想那些事情, 她就会像百里茜那样嚎叫起来了.

sentences.en: Now , she was going to bawl like a child and cry out: " I've been a devil!
sentences.cn: 她几乎要像孩子似的大喊大叫,痛痛快地说: " 我是个魔鬼!

sentences.en: Oh, hush! You know how I hate people who bawl all the time.
sentences.cn: 哦, 你不要闹啊! 我就最恨动不动就哭的人.

sentences.en: Prissy began to bawl suddenly, loudly, the sound adding to Scarlett's own uneasiness.
sentences.cn: 百里茜突然大声嚎叫起来, 那声音使思嘉越发不安了.

sentences.en: tales of how she bawled out employees.
sentences.cn: 关于她如何训斥员工的故事。

sentences.en: Versed Vitex bawl down low chamber Fu Chang Chong - pin - yun Queen hit?
sentences.cn: 精通牡呶压低厅傅叉嗯林中 斌 云女王击中?

sentences.en: Yeah , I could never bawl out my kid like that.
sentences.cn: 我从来不会像那样大声责骂我的小孩.

sentences.en: You don't have to bawl out like that. Eeverybody can hear you.
sentences.cn: 你不必这样大声喊叫,大家都能听见你.

sentences.en: You know how I hate people who bawl all the time.
sentences.cn: 你知道我就看不惯那种成天嚷嚷嚷的人.

sentences.en: You need not bawl; I'm not going to hurt you.
sentences.cn: 不用大声嚷嚷, 我不会伤害你的.

sentences.en: Your mother will bawl you out when she sees this mess.
sentences.cn: 当你母亲看到这混乱的局面时她会责骂你的.

words.tran_cn: 大声叫出；大声宣布；叫卖

phrases.tran_cn: 大声训斥：高声或严厉的谴责
(非正式)大声训斥，把…痛骂一顿

trans.tran_en: to shout in a loud voice

trans.tran_cn: 大声叫出，大声宣布，叫卖（货物）
